alert.note: Alert for Coastal Dixie; Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 12:04PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Lafayette, Dixie and eastern Taylor Counties through 100 PM EDT... At 1204 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 18 miles northwest of Steinhatchee to near Horseshoe Point. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cross City, Steinhatchee, Perry, Horseshoe Point, Horseshoe Beach, Pinland, Tennille, Shamrock, Jug Island, Clara, Cross City Airport, Dekle Beach, Jonesboro, Jack Lee Island, Foley, Salem, Perry-Foley Airport, Cedar Island, Fish Creek and Cooks Hammock. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for Big Bend of Florida.
